pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Fundamental AnalysisThis package has been depreciated and has been improved through the FinanceToolkit. Please use `pip install financetoolkit` instead. For more information, see: https://github.com/JerBouma/FinanceToolkitTo find symbols of specific sectors and/or industries have a look at my [Finance Database](https://github.com/JerBouma/FinanceDatabase).
